fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Paralysis: When a player has 5 or more stacks of poison, they are unable to defend against any attacks.
- Caustic: When a player has 2 or more stacks of poison, they draw 1 less card at the end of the phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Poison: Pick a player. They gain 2 stacks of Poison immediately. [4 uses, 1 CD, Post-Mortem]
- Concoct: Change a card into Reforged Poison! [Infinite uses, 2 CD]
- Antidote: Play a Reforged Heal! on someone. [2 uses, 1 CD]
